name: Animal World
description: From land to sea, from the Arctic to the tropics, the diverse animals and their habitats showcase the vitality and charm of nature.

groups.name: Wild Animals
groups.description: Species that inhabit the wilderness, possessing strong survival instincts.

groups.name: Tropical Rainforest Animals
groups.description: The colorful rainforest dwellers and their rich ecological chains.

groups.name: Aquatic Life
groups.description: Fish, coral, and aquatic mammals in oceans, rivers, and lakes.

groups.name: Domesticated Animals
groups.description: Animals raised by humans, such as farm or household animals like chickens, ducks, cows, and sheep.

groups.name: Insect World
groups.description: The microscopic world of insects, with their diverse forms and large numbers.

groups.name: Felines
groups.description: Elegant and fierce predators like lions, tigers, and leopards.

groups.name: Canines
groups.description: Intelligent and social animals like wolves, foxes, and dogs.

groups.name: Bird Watching
groups.description: The colorful plumage and melodious songs of sky spirits.

groups.name: Amphibians and Reptiles
groups.description: The cold-blooded lives of lizards, snakes, frogs, and turtles.

groups.name: Grassland Animals
groups.description: Species that roam or herd on vast grasslands, such as antelopes and zebras.

groups.name: Polar Animals
groups.description: Representatives of extreme cold environments, such as penguins and polar bears.

groups.name: Rare and Endangered
groups.description: Species on the brink of extinction, urgently needing protection.

groups.name: Animal Babies
groups.description: The adorable and playful young of various animals.

groups.name: Predators
groups.description: Naturally fierce hunters like cheetahs, eagles, and vultures.

groups.name: Prehistoric Creatures (Dinosaurs etc.)
groups.description: Massive beings that dominated land or sea in ancient times.

groups.name: Primates
groups.description: Intelligent species closely related to humans, such as apes and monkeys.

groups.name: Deep Sea Giants
groups.description: Enormous creatures inhabiting the deep sea, like whales and giant squid.

groups.name: Hunting Scenes
groups.description: Tense moments of predators or humans hunting in the wild.

groups.name: Animal Societies
groups.description: Social forms of animals, such as ant colonies or wolf packs.

groups.name: Insects, Fish, and Crustaceans
groups.description: Small aquatic or water-edge ecosystems with diverse invertebrates.

groups.name: Wildlife Conservation
groups.description: Scenes of humans and animals coexisting harmoniously in nature reserves.

groups.name: Human-Animal Interaction
groups.description: Warm scenes of people interacting with animals, such as pet companionship or wildlife observation.

groups.name: Farm Animals
groups.description: Common farm animals living leisurely lives, such as cows, horses, and sheep.

groups.name: Pets and Cute Animals
groups.description: Healing small animals, such as domesticated cats, dogs, and rodents.
